column4: how can i resize my ubuntu partition to make it larger? right now its 15gb id like it be about 30gb... i have gparted installed just dont know how to use it :/
you need to boot from the Live CD and do it with gparted from there, because you can't resize the partition with gparted when it's already in use
how do i access gparted from the live cd? just go to install?
